name: Quatre
overview: A well, geometric shapes falling down, filling the gaps to destroy the lines… Who has never heard of this masterpiece of a game created in the mid-eighties? Originally planned to be a little game offered for download, Quatre has finally been revised to be released physically in a cartridge and to offer more features like a two player mode. And for those who wonder why this game is called Quatre (four in French), it is a reference to the Greek word “tetra” found in “Tetromino” (game pieces composed of four blocks each).
